about_the_game:
Chess, but continuous!


Avalog is a chess game where the pieces aren't fixed to the squares on the board - they can sit anywhere between. Set in a charming 8-bit Arthurian world, players can challenge their friends either on the couch or online. This is a demo, featuring one of the five factions to be available in the full version.

Key Features:

  • A new take on a classic: learn which strategies work best in the new dimension!
  • Customization: choose from a selection of palettes and maps.
  • Lore! Explore some of the Arthurian (and definitely not Arthurian) mythology.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

name: Avalog Demo

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or above
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

Recommended:
